parameters.name: Expiration
parameters.description: The time when the key expires.Example: "1690081381".

parameters.name: ExpirationTtl
parameters.description: The time when the key expires.Example: "3600".

parameters.name: Key
parameters.description: The key. The key can be up to 512 characters in length, and cannot contain spaces.

parameters.name: Value
parameters.description: The value of the key. The maximum size is 2 MB (2 x 1000 x 1000 bytes).
